Package model

Class Ships

java.lang.Object
model.Ships
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ship_Four, Ship_One, Ship_Three, Ship_Two
public abstract class Ships extends Object
Ships are the objects in battleship used to determine if ship has been shot, whether the entire ship has been shot, and eventually whether the game has been won. They contain coordinates with their position, positions of shot locations, etc.
Author:
everyone

    • Ships

      public Ships(Coord coord, int size, boolean up)
      if up, make ship point up. if not up, make ship point right tbh it might be better to use a string "up" or "right" but i am using a random number generator so it is easier for me to just cast to boolean

    • hit

      public boolean hit(int x_coord, int y_coord)
      Takes x and y coordinates of the board and marks them as hits in the 'hits' array. Also checks if all spaces have been hit to mark the ship as sunk.
      Parameters:
      x_coord - - x coordinate of board
      y_coord -
      Returns:
      boolean of whether the ship was hit
